item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Overview This guide is intended to serve as a basic introduction for using ZAP to perform security testing, even if you donâ€™t have a background in security testing. To that end, some security testing concepts and terminology is included but this document is not intended to be a comprehensive guide to either ZAP or security testing.
